name: St. Gemma Galgani

locations.description: Lived in Lucca, Italy, known for her mystical experiences and stigmata

summary: Gemma Galgani was an Italian mystic and stigmatic who lived in Lucca. She experienced visions, ecstasies, and received the stigmata. Despite her desire to become a Passionist nun, she was unable to enter religious life due to poor health. She is known for her intense devotion to the Passion of Christ and her mystical experiences, and is the patron saint of students, pharmacists, and those suffering from back pain.
